pr_title: Logging dig difinition fetched by http_call> operator

timeline.bodyText: I am afraid of increasing server log.  If max response size is big, this log is also big.
timeline.author: yoyama

replies.author: petitviolet

timeline.message:
Logging dig difinition fetched by http_call> operator

To make debugging easier, logging digdag definition which is fetched by `http_call>` operator.
Also added a test case for `HttpCallOperatorFactory` to confirm added logging works as expected.

For example, the log looks like:
```
11:09:25.035 [Test worker] INFO  i.d.s.o.HttpCallOperatorFactory - Fetched definition for http_call>:
+sample:
  echo>: 'hello'
```
